<!-- Main body and information -->
# Vicente Javier Viera Guízar
## Software Engineer
### Work Experience
-----------------------------------------------------
#### RAYO
##### *Main Web Frontend Developer and Leader*
Fintech startup focused on cryptocurrency and the easy access and management of bank accounts.
- Developed application's web landing page using __Astro__, __TypeScript__, __Tailwind__, __Sass__, __CVA__, __React__ and __Render__.
- Worked in the design of web's landing page UX/UI.
### Projects

-----------------------------------------------------
#### [Brainiac][Brainiac]
##### *September 26, 2023 — Present*
###### Main Researcher and Main Software Engineer
Real-time __Electroencelography__ signals interpreter and visualizer application research project. Represents cerebral real-time brain signals and renders the information into a 3D brain model by highlighting the active areas. It has a web version using __Vite__, __React__, __TypeScript__, and __Three.js__. It has an ongoing native desktop application using __C++__ framework __Cinder__.
- Designed __User Interface__.
- Implemented principal __rendering components__ and, __rendering and 3D models loading algorithms__.
- Scene logic and physics.
#### [PowerDash][PowerDash]
##### *February 20, 2023*
###### Frontend Engineer
Web-based application designed for __IBM__. Dashboard used for the administration of IBM's employees certifications. Keeps up to date the employees with the most recient and relevant courses and certificates of the industry. It handles the creation of teams based on the necesities and the employees currents certificates. Developed using the __T3 Stack__: __TypeScript__, __tRPC__, __Prisma__, __Next.js__, __Tailwind__, __Class-Variance-Authority__ and __NextAuth__
- Developed project's __UI component library__ using __Class-Variance-Authority__.
- Wrote __tRPC backend endpoints__.
- Generated frontend test using __Cypress__.
#### [ROLAC][ROLAC]
##### *August 13, 2022*
###### Frontend Leader Developer
Multi-plataform mobile application created for the mexican food bank civil organization BAMX. It manages the received donations from people and parent businesses. It handles the collection and integrity of the donated food along with the quality of the carity apports. It was created using __React Native__, __Expo__ and __Postgres__.
- Managed the project's frontend desing and implementation.
- Colaborated developing __Routing__, __UI Library Components__ and making the final __Build up page's view__. 
### Technical Skills

-----------------------------------------------------
__Programming Languages:__ C++, PowerShell, JavaScript and TypeScript.  
__Web Development:__ HTML, CSS, React, Next, Astro, Vite, Tailwind, CVA and Three.js.  
__Desktop development:__ Cinder, Ultralight and Basic SDL OpenGL.
### Technologies/Development Tools

-----------------------------------------------------
Git, GitHub, GitHub/Projects, Visual Studio 2022, Visual Studio Code, Node.js and CMake.
### Education:

-----------------------------------------------------
#### *Mexico, 2020 – 2024*
##### Software Engineer
###### Instituto de Tecnológico Estudios Superiores de Monterrey 
#### *Mexico, 2017 – 2020*
##### Programming Technician
###### Universidad del Valle de Atemajac
